title: Charcuterie,sausages and pate
creator_contributor_role: KQED-TV (Television station : San Francisco, Calif.), production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cookery
description: Episode of Series "Cooking at the Academy". Find out just how satisfying it is to prepare your own terrines, pates and sausages. The video introduces you to these culinary techniques in three recipes which include the artistically layered Vegetable Terrine, Country-style Pate which can be made in a food processor and zesty Chicken and Apple Sausage.
related_objects: Series; S01150; Cooking at the Academy; Active; 1991
